description: Try our easy to follow Spiced Lamb Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ lamb,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Lamb,Egg free,Sesame free,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Spiced Lamb Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: To make a rub, combine all ingredients in a snap-lock bag. Add 8 lamb cutlets. Seal bag and rub well to coat. Refrigerate for 1 hour.

Preheat a barbecue grill on medium. Drizzle a little olive oil into bag with cutlets. Rub together well. Transfer cutlets to a preheated grill plate for 2-3 minutes each side, for medium, or until cooked to your liking.
